Home » Hobbies

My hobbies:

Cycling

One of my favourite ways to get in touch with nature and express myself. I enjoy all styles but I'm most in touch with Mountain Bike and trail riding.

  • Learn basic mechanics
  • Creativity

Photography

For me, photography is the way to freely play with light in order to replicate or alter the reality as desired. I enjoy learning the technique and practicing with my digital camera while capturing moments.

Admiring Nature

I was raised in a town next to Cabarceno Nature Park, where I have had always the privilege to admire the beauty of worldwide nature.

Motorbikes

Precission and concentration are key while driving my favourite means of transport. For me, biking is not just a way to get to places, but a way into making my travels more exciting and rewarding.

Music

I enjoy unconuntable genres...

  • I like creating public playlists in my favourite Music Platform as Raul.laCotering.
